Miss running into friends in real life? Well now you can bump into friends online! 

See when your friends are active on the same site! Easily message friends from anywhere!

-------------------------------------------------------

Privacy and Security
• We don't sell your data.
• Website domains are shared when you are on the same site, but paths stay private.
• Only friends you add see your activity.
• Incognito means incognito. Surf the World doesn't have access to private browsing.
• Disable at any time!
